title: Development Process for a Technology Integration Checklist for Simulation/VR-Based Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Proficiency and Intermediate-Level Language Skills
context.additional_context: Process for developing and applying a checklist to guide learner-customized technology tool selection.

learning_goals: Learners can propose at least three criteria for evaluating the pedagogical suitability of technological tools based on literature analysis.
Learners can select appropriate technological tools for simulation/VR-based language learning environments using a checklist.
Learners can identify at least five organizational-level support requirements (hardware/software/budget) that may arise during technology integration.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
